member.name: T:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources.Accents
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Grave=◌̀ Accute=◌́ Circumflex=◌̂ Tilde=◌̃ Macron=◌̄ Overline=◌̅ Breve=◌̆ Dot Above=◌̇ Diaeresis/Umlaut=◌̈ Hook Above=◌̉ Ring Above=◌̊ Double Accute=◌̋ Caron/Háček=◌̌ Double Grave=◌̏ Ogonek=◌̨ Cedilla=◌̧ Tilde Below=◌̰ Macron Below=◌̱ Turned Comma Above=◌̒ Koronis=◌̓.

member.name: P:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources.Affricates
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Voiceless alveolar sibilant affricate=t͡s Voiced alveolar sibilant affricate=d͡z Voiceless palato-alveolar sibilant affricate=t͡ʃ Voiced palato-alveolar sibilant affricate=d͡ʒ Voiceless retroflex sibilant affricate=ʈ͡ʂ Voiced retroflex sibilant affricate=ɖ͡ʐ Voiceless alveolo-palatal sibilant affricate=t͡ɕ Voiced alveolo-palatal sibilant affricate=d͡ʑ Voiceless bilabial post-trilled dental stop=t̪͡ʙ̥ Voiceless bilabial affricate=p͡ɸ Voiced bilabial affricate=b͡β Voiceless labiodental affricate=p̪ [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources.Consonants
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Voiceless bilabial nasal=m̥ Bilabial nasal=m Labiodental nasal=ɱ Linguolabial nasal=n̼ Voiceless alveolar nasal=n̥ Alveolar nasal=n Voiceless retroflex nasal=ɳ̊ Retroflex nasal=ɳ Voiceless palatal nasal=ɲ̊ Palatal nasal=ɲ Voiceless velar nasal=ŋ̊ Velar nasal=ŋ Uvular nasal=ɴ Voiceless bilabial stop=p Voiced bilabial stop=b Voiceless labiodental stop=p̪ Voiced labiodental stop=b̪ Voiceless linguolabial stop=t̼ Voiced linguolabial stop=d̼ Voiceless dental stop=t̪ Voiced dental stop=d̪ Voi [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources.Cyrillic
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Ye grave /e/=ѐ Yo /jo/=ё Dje /dʑ/=ђ Gje /dʑ/=ѓ Yest/Ukrainian Ye /je/=є Dze /dz/=ѕ Dotted I /i/=і Yi /ji/=ї Je /j/=ј Lje /ʎ/=љ Nje /ɲ/=њ Tshe /tɕ/=ћ Kje /c/=ќ I with grave /i/=ѝ Short U /w/=ў Dzhe /ɖʐ/=џ Omega /o/=ѡ Yat /æ/=ѣ Short I with tail /j̊/=ҋ Semisoft sign /◌ʲ/=ҍ Er with tick /r̥/=ҏ Ge with upturn /ɡ/=ґ Ghayn/Ge with stroke /ʁ/=ғ Ge with middle hook /ɣ/=ҕ Zhje /tʂ/, /dʑ/=җ Dhe /ð/=ҙ Ka with descender /q/=қ Ka with vertical stroke /ɟ/=ҝ Ka with stroke /qʼ/=ҟ Bashkir Qa/Ba [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources.Diacritics
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Voiceless below=◌̥ Voiceless above=◌̊ Voiced=◌̬ Faucalized voice=◌͈ Hollow voice=◌͚ Aspirated=◌ʰ Breathy voice/Murmured Voice=◌ʱ More rounded below=◌̹ More rounded above=◌͗ More rounded aside=◌˒ Less rounded below=◌̜ Less rounded above=◌͑ Less rounded aside=◌˓ Advanced below=◌̟ Advanced aside=◌˖ Retracted below=◌̠ Retracted aside=◌˗ Centralized=◌̈ Mid-centralized=◌̽ Syllabic/Vocalic below=◌̩ Syllabic/Vocalic above=◌̍ Non-syllabic/Semivowel below=◌̯ Non-syllabic/Semivowel above=◌̑ Rhot [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources.Greek
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Kai (and)=ϗ Digamma /w/=ϝ Pamphylian Digamma /w/=ͷ Heta /h/=ͱ Koppa /k/=ϙ San /s/=Ϻ Sampi /s/=ϡ Archaic Sampi /s/=ͳ Sho /ʃ/=ϸ.

member.name: P:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources.HtmlStyle
P:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources.HtmlTemplate
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to {0}

{0}

{1}
{2} {3} .

member.name: P:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources.PageExportHtml
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="utf-8"> <title>{0}</title> </head> <body> {1} </body> </html>.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Positions=0|0.9|1 Angle=90 Radius=0 Border Color=~171 Highlight Color$0 Bottom Only=1.

member.name: P:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources.Transparent2
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Close front unrounded vowel/High front unrounded vowel=i Close front rounded vowel/High front rounded vowel=y Close front protruded vowel/High front protruded vowel=y̫ Close central unrounded vowel/High central unrounded vowel=ɨ Close central rounded vowel/High central rounded vowel=ʉ Close central compressed vowel/High central compressed vowel=ÿ Close back unrounded vowel/High back unrounded vowel=ɯ Close back rounded vowel/High back rounded vowel=u Close back compressed vowel/High back compressed [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: T:LangPad.AppNoteboo
member.summary: Handles operations on the current notebook used by LangPad.

member.name: F:LangPad.AppNoteboo.NTVersion
member.summary: The internal file version for notebook (*.nt) files created with this version.

member.name: P:LangPad.AppNoteboo.CurrentNotebook
member.summary: The document open in this instance of LangPad.

member.name: P:LangPad.AppNoteboo.PageIndex
member.summary: The index of the currently open page in the notebook.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppNoteboo.PageExists(System.Int32)
member.summary: Check if a page is within range of the current notebook's pages.
member.returns: If a page exists at that index.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppNoteboo.InsertPage(System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Insert a page to the current notebook.
member.param: The index to place it at.

member.name: T:LangPad.AutoUpdater
member.summary: Work with AutoUpdaterDotNET

member.name: M:LangPad.AutoUpdater.CheckForUpdates
member.summary: Check for updates and display a dialog if there are any

member.name: T:LangPad.Html
member.summary: Handles conversion to HTML

member.name: M:LangPad.Html.RtfToHtml(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Convert RTF to HTML.
member.param: The title, if not only body.
If only the contents inside the body tag of the HTML document should be returned.
member.returns: The RTF that has been converted to HTML.

member.name: T:LangPad.Markdown
member.summary: Handles the conversion to Markdown

member.name: T:LangPad.ImageResizer
member.summary: Module handling the resizing of images.

member.name: M:LangPad.ImageResizer.ResizeImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Size,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Resize an image to a new size, with or without preserving its aspect ratio. Does not modify the original image.
member.param: If the aspect ratio of the source image should be preserved.
member.returns: A copy of the source image, resized to the new size.

member.name: M:LangPad.ImageResizer.HeightAfterWidthAdjust(System.Drawing.Size,System.Drawing.Size,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the height value of a rectangle after adjusting its width.
member.param: If the aspect ratio should be preserved
member.returns: The height value of the new rectangle.

member.name: M:LangPad.ImageResizer.WidthAfterHeightAdjust(System.Drawing.Size,System.Drawing.Size,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the width value of a rectangle after adjusting its height.
member.param: If the aspect ratio should be preserved
member.returns: The width value of the new rectangle.

member.name: M:LangPad.CharacterEditor.SelectWord(System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase,System.Char,System.Char)
member.summary: Select a string in a textbox between two characters.

member.name: T:LangPad.AppInstance
member.summary: Contains information about the current instance of the application.

member.name: F:LangPad.AppInstance.CharEditWindow
member.summary: The character editor tools window used between windows.

member.name: F:LangPad.AppInstance.FirstTabUpdate
member.summary: If the first tab has been updated on the main form.

member.name: F:LangPad.AppInstance.SmartReplaceList
member.summary: A list of accent+base character combinations to replace with a single character.

member.name: F:LangPad.AppInstance.ApplicationTheme
member.summary: The theme of the application's interface.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppInstance.GetIconResolution
member.summary: Get the icon resolution set by the user.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppInstance.GetCurrentVersion
member.summary: Get the current version of the application.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppInstance.GetVersionString
member.summary: Get the application version, formatted as a string.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppInstance.GetAppDisplayName
member.summary: Get the application name, plus its version number as a string.
member.returns: The display name used throughout the application.

member.name: M:LangPad.CharacterButton.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Create a new button representing a character.
member.param: If the description is multiple lines.
